channel.title: Lots of help 1st ps V0id-pkz
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307956.0.html
yoused V0id-pkz and i need help
1.how add new command
2.how to make new mons
3. how to make a mon drop
4. how make a mon to respawn
5.how to make a shop
6.how stop makeing ::noclip ban co-owner's
help! :eek: :eek: :eek: :confused: :|

item.title: Lots of help 1st ps V0id-pkz
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

I’m pretty sure your all set with the others, if not let me know…

noclip
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”)) {
if (playerRights >= 3) {
sendMessage = (“you are noclipping”);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " what ever message you wanna send here");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}
}

check if you have any other copyies of the noclip cause it can mess with it, and i havent actually tested this code but i’m 99% sure it’ll work

Read full topic

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“knightreed, post:1, topic:269128”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307956.0.html

yoused V0id-pkz and i need help

1.how add new command

2.how to make new mons

  1. how to make a mon drop

  2. how make a mon to respawn

5.how to make a shop

6.how stop makeing ::noclip ban co-owner’s

help! :eek: :eek: :eek: :|[/quote]
1)

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("command")) { addItem(995, 1); teleportToX = 1234; teleportToY = 1234; sendMessage("Message."); }

  1. Autospawn configuration file.

  2. NPCDrops configuration file.

  3. It should automatically respawn.

  4. Shops configuration file.

  5. Show me your noclip command.
